i like how you use a picture of the actual machine that's building the real SLS.... I'm a nerd about these things....

Did no one tell them to reinforce the floor? I mean really I hope they canned someone over that ....-up.

Okay back to pretend land.

Revised NOS Technical Lander

Now with more light bulbs and molecules

That is without doubt the finest KSP orbital assembly and space station construction effort I have ever had the pleasure of seeing, absolutely fantastic work!
Looks like you got the doors and legs fixed.

Yanfret, what do you suggest putting in those little boxes? I always fill them with KAS containers, they fit nicely and help to bring the pipe pieces to link all my buildings up.

Can I also suggest you add a number to the lid of the box corresponding to the number the door animation has? That way, we can be sure we are opening the right box when we only want one opened.
That might not be able to be done as the boxes share the same texture.

YANFRET is your inbox full ? Or did, I just send you double messaages whoops if, I did.

Edited June 2, 2015 by Mecripp2

I dont know but on the door animation issue there is a temporary fix and also a service request open with the manufacturer.

If you go to space center and come back to the lander the doors re align and the leg pieces appear.

Thats funny and also, I loaded up a older CMES mod with the lander and it works fine had then both in at the same time and one was off and one wasn't, Sent you the files and also why the firespitter plugin not that, I mind but did change it to ModuleAnimateGeneric, I try to stay stock. lol
Good thinking send them again because Chaka's inbox was full

Very special thanks to MeCripp for sorting out the landing legs issue we were having on both NOS and Bobcat landers. They are both in perfect working order now, so let's celebrate with an all new Munar 2x system!!

MLS - Munar 2x Technical

Initial (successful) flight test to south pole of Mun and surface rendezvous

Beautiful gallery, that. Is that a different skybox in those shots? Looks amazing.

Greetings!

Chaka Monkey 1.0.2 has been released. Please visit our brand new release thread at

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124388-1-0-2-Chaka-Monkey-Exploration-Systems?p=1997211#post1997211

Edited June 5, 2015 by YANFRET

Congratulations on your release! I've been lurking around here for a while now, but it's been really amazing how you've developed all this. I'll give your mod a try on a fresh install, but already; many many many thanks to you and all those who have contributed!

I really, really want to bust this one out in Realism Overhaul, or at the very least, Real Solar System. What all would need to be done to get this to work in it? Keeping in mind I'm merely a rabid consumer of mods, and not a modder myself. This is more a feeding of my own curiosity.

Yeah, ATM's a little buggy. It ruins Astronomer's Visual Pack and may also wreak havoc with your parts. That said, OpenGL mode isn't a safe alternative either. Whenever I try and run in OpenGL my game crashes with a memory error, supposedly pointing to illegal memory access. If you're going to use CMES, it's best to either a) go Bob Fitch Style and don't install parts you don't need or create a separate install with CMES and nothing else to minimize memory use. Either works, I use mostly a) with a bit of .
Do you think it would be easier to build the rockets in real life or Realism Overhaul?

I really, really want to bust this one out in Realism Overhaul, or at the very least, Real Solar System. What all would need to be done to get this to work in it? Keeping in mind I'm merely a rabid consumer of mods, and not a modder myself. This is more a feeding of my own curiosity.

Yeah I would love to see this mod in RO. the Orion capsule, that nice SLS second stage...
